name: part_001
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Bandai / Banpresto products and booth information for hololive EXPO 2025.
Good Smile Company announcement for scale figures of Hoshimachi Suisei and AZKi based on 'The Last Frontier'.
FuRyu Prize announcement for various hololive plushies and figures.
UNDONE x hololive SUPER EXPO 2025 collaboration watches showcase.
iPASS card advertisement for visitors to Taiwan and hololive 6th fes. limited edition.
JOYSOUND X1 karaoke machine advertisement featuring high-energy rap and singing.
Montage of fan messages and illustrations for hololive 6th fes. 'Color Rise Harmony'.
Waiting screen for hololive 6th fes. STAGE3 with talent visuals.
Event safety announcement (Attention) regarding lighting and cheering.
Penlight colors reference chart followed by more fan messages.

subtitles.original: ホロライブエキスポ2025限定の一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中！
subtitles.english: A special Ichiban Kuji photo booth, exclusive to Hololive Expo 2025, is also open!

subtitles.original: モニターをタッチしてくじ券をめくり、出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english: Touch the monitor to flip the lottery ticket, and take a photo with the design that appears.

subtitles.original: (Singing) Last Frontier...
subtitles.english: (Singing) Last Frontier...

subtitles.original: hololive 5th fes. で歌われた
subtitles.english: Sung at hololive 5th fes.

subtitles.original: The Last Frontierからなんと！
subtitles.english: From The Last Frontier, amazingly!

subtitles.original: (Singing) ...捧げる歌を
subtitles.english: (Singing) ...the song dedicated to you

subtitles.original: フィギュア化決定！
subtitles.english: Figure production decided!

subtitles.original: (Singing) 守り抜いた地平で...
subtitles.english: (Singing) On the horizon we protected...

subtitles.original: あの感動をもう一度...
subtitles.english: That emotion once more...

subtitles.original: (Singing) 旅立つ歌を...
subtitles.english: (Singing) The song for departing...

subtitles.original: スケールフィギュア化決定
subtitles.english: Scale figure production decided

subtitles.original: フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが全国アミューズメント施設にて続々展開中！
subtitles.english: 'Hololive' prizes from FuRyu are appearing one after another at amusement facilities nationwide!

subtitles.original: 4月からは新たにひっかけフィギュアも登場！
subtitles.english: New "Hikkake" figures will also appear starting from April!

subtitles.original: Pick from 90 hololive and HOLOSTARS talents
subtitles.english: Pick from 90 hololive and HOLOSTARS talents

subtitles.original: 90人のhololiveとHOLOSTARSタレントから好きな1人を選ぼう！
subtitles.english: Choose your favorite one from 90 hololive and HOLOSTARS talents!

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: Providing the most convenient payment service while traveling in Taiwan.

subtitles.original: 新商品まもなく登場！
subtitles.english: New product coming soon!

subtitles.original: 一カ通限定盲包
subtitles.english: iPASS Limited Blind Bag

subtitles.original: 2025年夏 発売予定
subtitles.english: Scheduled for release in summer 2025

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲が入っていなかった...
subtitles.english: The song I wanted to sing wasn't there...

subtitles.original: だったらJOYSOUND X1で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: In that case, let's sing with JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 only one
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1 only one

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 曲数No.1
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, No. 1 in number of songs

subtitles.original: AIが採点 絶賛 カラオケ最高！ 最高！
subtitles.english: AI scoring, acclaim, karaoke is the best! The best!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND Evolution 見よ、最高の...
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND Evolution, behold, the best...

subtitles.original: 曲数No.1 歌いたい曲があるって最高！
subtitles.english: No. 1 in number of songs, it's the best to have the songs you want to sing!

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください。
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: また、声出し応援はOKです。
subtitles.english: Also, cheering out loud is OK.

subtitles.original: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: Cheering loudly is OK.
subtitles.english: Cheering loudly is OK.
